name: Leighton Heritage Aviator Pilot Hat w/ Faux Goggles Toddler Childrens Photography Prop
description:
AVIATOR Pilot Hat with Faux Goggles Toddler Children’s Photography Prop

Take this flight with me in your NEW Aviator Hat!
Perfect Photography Prop!
This hat fits children with head circumference under 54cm

Decorative Stitching, Patches, Pockets & Faux Goggles on Faux Leather/Suede look Fabric & Faux Cashmere look Lining. 
Fully functional chin strap with button compliment this little hat and offer the option of a completely different look!
Extremely soft lining will leave your little Aviator soaring with Joy!

Faux Goggles are for Decorative Use Only

International orders are welcome, Please contact prior to ordering we'd be happy to adjust shipping based on destination.

Please should you have any further questions or concerns do not hesitate to contact us directly.

categories.name: Leighton Heritage Props

name: Leighton Heritage Newborn Stretch Wraps
description:
Leighton Heritage Gorgeous Stretch Knit Wrap

Perfect for swaddling newborns in a variety of props. Super Soft, Stretchy open weave with nubby texture make for a very versatile prop!
Generous Width and Length Measuring 64x16’’ un-stretched.

Available in a variety of colors offering the PERFECT prop to your collection. 

• Please note this listing includes (1) Leighton Heritage Stretch Knit Wrap

Ready to Ship!
Can't wait to use this product? GREAT NEWS!
Leighton Heritage includes PRIORITY shipping with United States (Domestic) orders.
Estimated delivery is typically 2-3 days from the day the order is placed depending upon the destination.

International orders are welcome, Please contact prior to ordering we'd be happy to adjust shipping based on destination.

Please should you have any further questions or concerns do not hesitate to contact us directly.

xoxo

name: Leighton Heritage - White - Soft, Cozy, Cuddly Faux Fur Nest - Perfect Newborn Photography Prop
description:
Beautiful 18'' x 30'' Soft White Faux Fur Photography Prop
The touch of pure elegance you've been anxiously awaiting!

• Dimensions are approximate (May be larger) 18'' x 30''
• Perfect Photography Prop for Newborn Portraits that can be hand / machine washed 
with care instructions! Fur will shed slightly
• Luxurious, the nap is over three inches
• Easy for travel and or on-location Photography, Stores well!

International orders are welcome, Please contact prior to ordering we'd be happy to adjust shipping based on destination.

Please should you have any further questions or concerns do not hesitate to contact us directly.

One of the simplest ways to change the feel of your studio photography.
From Classic to Trendy - Modern to Chic

Beautiful 44" (3.6 FT) x 66" (5.5FT) Faux Wood Backdrop / Floordrop 

• Perfect Photography Backdrop / Floordrop Prop
• Photorealistic (photo-quality surface)
• Rubber Backing (Skid Resistant)
• 100% Machine-washable and dryable
